content: repeat round 3 and round 4 until there are 13 15 17 19 sts on each side of the marker 72 84 96 108 sts total heel turn *there are many tutorials for making ds s german short row on youtube * round 1 needle 1 instep needle 2 k to 2nd m remove m and turn from here on you will not work on instep until you finish heel turn and heel flap row 2 make ds p to m remove m turn row 3 make ds k to last ds turn row 4 make ds p to last ds turn repeat row 3 and row 4 until there are 9 9 11 13 sts in between the ds s on ws before you turn to rs for the last ds ©2019 maiko hikosaka all rights reserved next row make the last ds k across picking up all ds s along the way until the last ds ssk the last ds together with the 1st gusset st on lh be careful not to drop the ds turn next row sl1 p across picking up all the ds s along the way until the last ds purl the last ds together with the 1st gusset st on lh turn heel flap i used eye of partridge but you can use whatever heel pattern you like row 1 sl1 k1 to 2 sts before the gap you made in the last row where you turned sl1 ssk turn row 2 sl1 p to 1 st before the gap p2tog turn row 3 sl2 k1 sl1 to 2 sts before the gap k1 ssk turn row 4 sl1 p to 1 st before the gap p2tog turn repeat row 1 - row 4 until there is 1 st left on lh on the purl row next row repeat either row 1 or row 3 depending on where you are k the last st do not turn *if you are concerned about the gap that might be created btwn the heel and instep you can pick up an exra st in btwn and decrease 1 st on the next round leg from bor… needle 1 instep continue with the established pattern from when you started the heel turn needle 2 k to end but make sure to end on repeat to achieve desired length minus 1 /2 5cm for the cuff round 6 of the instep pattern ©2019 maiko hikosaka all rights reserved left instep = left lace + k to end *size 1 & 2 will start from column 2 and end with column 15 written instructions left lace size 1 and 2 round 1 p1 k1 x3 k2tog p1 k1 x2 yo k1 p1 round 2 p1 k1 x2 p1 k2tog p1 k1 x2 yo k2 p1 round 3 p1 k1 x2 k2tog p1 k1 x2 yo p1 k2 p1 round 4 p1 k1 p1 k2tog p1 k1 x2 yo k1 p1 k2 p1 round 5 p1 k1 k2tog p1 k1
